title: Software Developer - Adaremit
description: Work as a software developer on the frontend and backend sides, collaborating with the team in creating websites and mobile applications for PT Anugrah Danamas Remit (Adaremit).

title: Fullstack Developer - MFC
description: Becoming a full-stack developer for MFC in the "Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat (PkM)" program, playing a role in developing software with the team for MFC.

title: Student - Mikroskil University
description: Became an information systems student at Mikroskil University and achieved a provisional GPA of 3.97.
